data.title: Teaching Faculty: Program in Critical Theory
data.text:
Teaching Faculty

Below is an ongoing list of faculty who have regularly taught courses approved for the Critical Theory Cluster and Certificate. If you are interested in being added to our Critical Theory teaching and research network, please e-mail criticaltheory@northwestern.edu.

This list is useful for our gradute students interested and participating in the Critical Theory Cluster, as it provides a resource for interdisciplinary collaborations.
